verbose_text: Twenty-three AIH patients including five post-transplant patients with acute rejection (AR) and 18 patients without AR (non AR) were studied for Fas, FasL and Foxp3 gene expression in peripheral blood mononuclear cells on days 1, 3 and 7 after transplantation by real-time PCR.
evidence: Fas, FasL and Foxp3 gene expression
